title: bullet point turns to yen????
content:
Hi there I wonder if anyone can explain why when exporting as a pdf from quark a document containing Helvetica 45 light, bullet points (alt-8) can sometimes export as japanese yen sign?

 [‹ OpenType and Mac Word 2004](http://web.archive.org/web/20070809001436/http:/typophile.com/node/17517 "Go to previous forum topic") [line height spacing issue in .otf format ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070809001436/http:/typophile.com/node/17540 "Go to next forum topic")
author: R27

comments.content: The same thing has happened to me in InDesign when trying to make bullets using Emigre’s Eidetic Neo.
